name: Hariyama ex
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_body.name: Commanding Aura
poke_body.effect: As long as Hariyama ex is your Active Pokémon, your opponent can’t play any Stadium cards from his or her hand.

attacks.name: Knock Off
attacks.effect: Choose 1 card from your opponent’s hand without looking and discard it.

attacks.name: Pivot Throw
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to Hariyama ex by attacks is increased by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
